original_text: Zechariah and Elizabeth obeyed God's commands and rules. God saw that they were righteous people. They did not do wrong things.
korean_text: 이 두 사람이 하나님 앞에 의인이니 주의 모든 계명과 규례대로 흠이 없이 행하더라

sentences.original_text: Zechariah and Elizabeth obeyed God's commands
God saw that they were righteous people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들이 의로운 사람인 것을 보셨습니다

sentences.original_text: They did not do wrong things
